   Appearing on CBS' "Face the Nation," Rep. Paul Ryan, R-Wis., said that

Louis Jacobson
   By Louis Jacobson August 8, 2013

Paul Ryan says government shutdown wouldn't sideline Obamacare

   Some congressional Republicans are threatening to deny funding for
   government operations unless a provision is included to defund President
   Barack Obama’s health care law.

Our ruling

   Ryan said that "Obamacare … carries on even under a government shutdown."
